article_title: Mount St. Mary’s President Declines to Resign
article_text:
A clash over the leadership and direction of a historic Catholic university in the hills of northern Maryland showed no signs of easing after the school’s embattled president declined to resign by Monday morning, as called for by the faculty.

In a 87-to-3 vote on Friday, the faculty of Mount St. Mary’s University demanded President Simon Newman step down following weeks of tension over his leadership style and vision. They voted...
